page.title: 16A LOCAL CHURCH SERVICE.
page.content: On Sunday 7th July I went to St Mary's Church in Lowdham.It was the Vicar's last service at Lowdham before he moves on to be Rector of Whitby. Inside ,the church was decorated with flowers because there were two weddings the day before.We sat at the back near the font which was also decorated with flowers because there was going to be a christening. The service started at 10am when the choir in their long red robes led the way down the aisle to the choir stalls.We sang hymns and listened to bible readings and the Vicar's sermon. Then a little girl was christened. Next was the service of Holy Communion.The adults were given bread and wine and the children were blessed.At the end of the service we went home.
